Body: I'd start with looking for descriptions that don't pertain to follow a specific framework like Minimalism, LFG or any of the many others but try to use and if necessary invent structures and terms that make sense for a prticular language. It may make comparisons harder but it may also may lead to a eureka moment. Schachter and Otanes' reference grammar for Tagalog, from 1972 is supposedly a good example.
